violations_detected.title: Script violations
violations_detected.evidence: Greeting: Agent opens call with only 'А' - missing company name, operator name, and offer to help. Closing: After customer says 'До свидания', agent asks 'Это вас ничему не обязывает?' instead of proper farewell with thanks and polite closing.

violations_detected.title: Echo method not used
violations_detected.evidence: Customer provided name 'Дмитрий' at 4.686s. Operator never repeated the name back with confirmation request ('Верно?', 'Правильно?'). Operator used the name later at 97.353s but did not perform echo verification.

violations_detected.title: No thank you for waiting
violations_detected.evidence: After first information search (announced at 11.166s 'Сейчас я подскажу' and 13.926s 'Сейчас я проверю'), operator provided answer at 15.466s without thanking customer for waiting.

violations_detected.title: No thank you for waiting
violations_detected.evidence: After second information search (announced at 52.868s 'Сейчас я посмотрю'), operator provided answer at 56.202s without thanking customer for waiting.

coaching_priorities.issue: Missing proper greeting with company name and operator name
coaching_priorities.recommendation: Always start calls with full greeting: company name, your name, and offer to help (e.g., 'Добрый день, компания [Название], меня зовут [Имя], чем могу помочь?')

coaching_priorities.issue: Echo method not used for customer name verification
coaching_priorities.recommendation: When customer provides contact information (name, phone, address), immediately repeat it back and ask for confirmation: 'Дмитрий, верно?' and wait for customer to confirm

coaching_priorities.issue: Not thanking customer for waiting after information searches
coaching_priorities.recommendation: After completing any information search, thank the customer for waiting before providing the answer (e.g., 'Спасибо за ожидание')
Always close calls properly with thanks and polite farewell, even after customer initiates goodbye

7.1.evidence: Opening: Only 'А' spoken, no proper greeting. Closing: No proper farewell after customer goodbye.
7.1.note: Critical script compliance issues at both call opening and closing

7.2.evidence: Customer name 'Дмитрий' collected but not echoed back with confirmation request

7.3.evidence: Intro at 0.346s (< 5s), disconnect at 0s from last speech (< 5s)

6.1.evidence: No critical silence detected, normal call termination

9.1.evidence: First search ~4s, second search ~3s, both well under 40s threshold

9.3.evidence: No gratitude expressed after either of two information searches
9.3.note: Two separate violations - neither search was followed by thank you

3.1.evidence: All customer requests answered: store hours provided, tire availability checked and communicated with full details

3.6.evidence: Operator announced search before providing information, used system verification

5.1.evidence: Complete information provided: availability date (Nov 7), price (6710 rub with 10% discount = 6039 rub), location (Vasilieva 37), product details (Kumho Wintercraft Ice White 32), bonus offers

10.2.evidence: Information delivery was logical and per script (after greeting issues)
10.2.note: Information content was good, but opening/closing violations captured in 7.1

10.3.evidence: Operator used customer name (Dmitry), maintained conversation flow, offered additional help
10.3.note: Dialogue management was adequate despite greeting/closing issues

10.6.evidence: Accurate and complete information delivered about tire availability, pricing, and store details

2.1.evidence: No service refusal, customer ended call naturally after receiving information

1.1.evidence: No profanity or harsh language detected in transcript

4.1.evidence: Customer was polite and cooperative throughout call
4.1.note: Text-based assessment only, full tone analysis would require audio

positive_observations: Fast and efficient information searches (both under 5 seconds)
Used customer name appropriately during conversation
Provided comprehensive product information including pricing, availability dates, and location
Offered additional alternatives when initial product was unavailable
Attempted to help customer with reservation offer
Professional tone maintained throughout the call

data_quality.confidence_notes: Word-level timestamps available for precise echo method detection. Transcription clear with good speaker diarization.
